name: SurviVE (itch) (Adhiraj.B)
description:
An "atmospheric horror" game set on an island.

You find yourself stranded on a mysterious island due to a storm, and you can't seem to find your friends that were journeying with you. 

Do you have the courage to find out what happened to your friends?

GitHub: https://github.com/ReanSchwarzer1/SurviVE

Controls:

  • Spacebar to jump
  • WASD to move
  • F to switch on/off torchlight

The game has a hunger system and you must use the food boxes/crates on the world. There are also batteries that you must collect if the torch on your flashlight runs out.
